attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the mood of the country is for political change. That the current Government is out of touch and not listening. That democracy is at threat should there not be a legitimate outlet for the anger felt by many of the population. We want a General Election and we want it NOW.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
